attributes.description: With the more assertive design, enhanced comfort, and recognised modularity, The Citroen C3 1.2 Puretech Shine is the ideal hatchback for urban and leisure activities. The C3 is both modern and connected, offering multiple driver assistance systems with further enhanced design elements. This vehicle comes with a 5 year or 100 000kms warranty, roadside assistance and service plan. Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
